titleStmt.title: Poems by Emily Brontë – A Symbolic and Intertextual Digital Edition

sourceDesc.p: Textes des poèmes d’Emily Brontë consultés sur le site Poetry Foundation (https://www.poetryfoundation.org).

div.p: In admiration of Emily Brontë’s poetic imagination.

list.item: I. The Night is Darkening Round Me

div.head: The Night is Darkening Round Me

lg.l: The night is darkening round me,
But a tyrant spell has bound me
Their bare boughs weighed with snow;
And the storm is fast descending,
But nothing drear can move me:

div.p: Encoded in TEI for an academic master project in Humanities.
